title: lstm_fusion_concat is failing
body_html:
Issue description

Finished processing dependencies for torch==0.5.0a0+2fb957d
root@caa3b923b4b3:/workspace/dldata/ngimel/pytorch_upstream# python test/test_jit.py 
.s.........s......x..x..x.F...x..............s.........s...............................................................................................
======================================================================
FAIL: test_lstm_fusion_concat (__main__.TestJit)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "test/test_jit.py", line 270, in test_lstm_fusion_concat
    ge = self.checkTrace(LSTMCellC, inputs)
  File "test/test_jit.py", line 751, in checkTrace
    self.assertTrue(torch.allclose(g2, g2_ge, atol=5e-4, rtol=1e-4))
AssertionError: False is not true

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Ran 151 tests in 21.529s

FAILED (failures=1, skipped=4, expected failures=4)

System Info

Pytorch ( 2fb957d), cuda 9.0, V100
